title: Himi 468
lyrics:
M.L.
(Ko e Saame 72)
1.
Ko Sīsū kuo pau mo’ona
Ke Tu’i Fakaleveleva;
‘E punou pē ki ai kotoa
‘E he fa’ahinga mo e lea.
2.
‘E fai ‘a e hū hono huafa,
Ngei hono fakamālō’ia,
Ngangatu hangē ha kakala,
‘O fakatupu fiefia.
3.
Manako hono hiva’aki
‘E he kakai kotoa pē;
Ko e tamaiki te nau fai,
Fai ‘e he fānau valevale.
4.
‘E tupu pē ‘a e monū’ia
Ha potu te ne a’u ki ai,
Hangē ha ngoue ‘uheina;
‘O lahi hono tāpuaki.
5.
Ko e ngaahi me’a naʻe mole muʻa
He hinga hotau ‘Uluaki,
‘E toe ‘omi he ‘Otua,
‘O tufa he Fanautama ni *.
